scripts.build-js: mkdir -pv dist/js  && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs js/thirdparty/jquery.js js/thirdparty/doubletaptogo.js js/app.js js/thirdparty/highcharts.js js/thirdparty/moment.js js/app/linechart.js js/app/nav.js js/app/sparkline.js js/app/chartRenderer.js js/app/supporting-content.js js/app/js-enhance.js --compress --mangle -o dist/js/main.js
scripts.postinstall: npm run build-css && npm run build-old-ie-css && npm run build-js
